scripts.setup: npm install && npm install --prefix app && npm install --prefix client
scripts.cdk-synth: npm run buildcheck && npx cdk synth
scripts.cdk-diff: npm run buildcheck && npx cdk diff
scripts.cdk-deploy: npm run buildcheck && npx cdk deploy --outputs-file ./cdk-exports.json
scripts.buildcheck: tsc --project tsconfig.json --pretty --noEmit && npm run lint && npm run buildcheck --prefix app && npm run buildcheck --prefix client
scripts.update: ncu -t minor -u && npm install && npm run update --prefix app && npm run update --prefix client
scripts.clean: rm -r build/ ; rm -r cdk.out/ ; npm run clean --prefix app ; npm run clean --prefix client
